title: The Story Behind All Those Nazi / Clown Memes
itunes:title: The Story Behind All Those Nazi / Clown Memes
description:
In Episode 90, Robert is joined by Katy Stoll and Cody Johnston to discuss the war on clowns. 

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Apu Apustaja
  2. Clown faces fine for protesting neo-Nazi march
  3. Virginia Man Using Accordion-Playing Clowns To Get Revenge On White Supremacist
  4. Swedish neo-Nazis met by clown activists
  5. Clowns Attack KKK Rally in Charlotte, NC with Humor
  6. Clowns Kicked KKK Asses
  7. Producers, The (1967) -- (Movie Clip) Springtime For Hitler
  8. The best way to fight neo-Nazis is to … laugh?
  9. Why Nazis Are So Afraid of These Clowns
  10. Patriot Prayer’s Joey Gibson has a sad day in Albany

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
